Joyful.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions. - Dalai Lama

Peaceful.quote: Peace is a daily, a weekly, a monthly process, gradually changing opinions, slowly eroding old barriers, quietly building new structures. - John F. Kennedy

Energetic.quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things. - Benjamin Franklin

Creative.quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun. - Albert Einstein

Neutral.quote: Life is a balance of holding on and letting go. - Rumi

Reflective.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living. - Socrates

Anxious.quote: Anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strength. - Charles Spurgeon

Sad.quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you. - Rumi

Angry.quote: Holding onto anger is like drinking poison and expecting the other person to die. - Buddha

Confused.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing. - Socrates
